faq.question: How many PDFs can I process at once?
faq.answer: Pro plan: up to 200 files per batch. Team plan: unlimited batch size. Process thousands of documents in one upload.

faq.question: How long does batch processing take?
faq.answer: Documents are processed in parallel. 100 documents take about the same time as 10 documents - typically 5-10 minutes total.

faq.question: Can I organize summaries by folders?
faq.answer: Yes! Upload folder structures and we preserve the organization. Summaries match the original folder hierarchy.

faq.question: Can I export all summaries at once?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Export as single consolidated PDF, individual files, Excel spreadsheet, or CSV. Choose your format.

faq.question: Does batch processing work with scanned PDFs?
faq.answer: Yes! Our OCR technology works in batch mode. Process hundreds of scanned documents at once.

faq.question: Which plan includes batch processing?
faq.answer: Pro plan ($19/mo): up to 200 files per batch. Team plan ($49/mo): unlimited batch size. Free and Starter: single files only.
